sn35.91:1.1: “Eja, bhikkhave, rogo, eja gando, eja sallam.
sn35.91:1.2: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, tathagato anejo viharati vitasallo.
sn35.91:1.3: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cepi akankheyya ‘anejo vihareyyam vitasallo’ti,
sn35.91:1.4: cakkhum na manneyya, cakkhusmim na manneyya, cakkhuto na manneyya, cakkhu meti na manneyya;
sn35.91:1.8: yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na manneyya, tasmimpi na manneyya, tatopi na manneyya, tam meti na manneyya.
sn35.91:1.9: Yanhi, bhikkhave, mannati, yasmim mannati, yato mannati, yam meti mannati, tato tam hoti annatha.
sn35.91:2.1: Jivham na manneyya, jivhaya na manneyya, jivhato na manneyya, jivha meti na manneyya;
sn35.91:2.5: yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na manneyya, tasmimpi na manneyya, tatopi na manneyya, tam meti na manneyya.
sn35.91:2.6: Yanhi, bhikkhave, mannati, yasmim mannati, yato mannati, yam meti mannati, tato tam hoti annatha. Annathabhavi bhavasatto loko bhavameva abhinandati …pe….
sn35.91:3.1: Manam na manneyya, manasmim na manneyya, manato na manneyya, mano meti na manneyya …
sn35.91:3.4: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi na manneyya, tasmimpi na manneyya, tatopi na manneyya, tam meti na manneyya.
sn35.91:3.5: Yanhi, bhikkhave, mannati, yasmim mannati, yato mannati, yam meti mannati, tato tam hoti annatha.
sn35.91:4.1: Yavata, bhikkhave, khandhadhatuayatana tampi na manneyya, tasmimpi na manneyya, tatopi na manneyya, tam meti na manneyya.
sn35.91:4.2: So evam amannamano na kinci loke upadiyati.
sn35.91:4.3: Anupadiyam na paritassati. Aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati.
sn35.91:4.4: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
